channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1460; 05:42PM; 10900 N Key West Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3R8zUKM; #PorterRanch; Firefighters responded to the one-story home fire, where they held the majority of the fire to the attached garage, although smoke filled the home. Two elderly residents (a male and a female) were transported to a local hospital in fair condition due to smoke inhalation. Ultimately, it took 33 firefighters 25 minutes to extinguish the flames. Cause under investigation.; FS 8; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 BC17 E107 E28 E287 E296 E8 EM15 RA70 RA828 RA87 T87 T96; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1460; 05:17PM; 10900 N Key West Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3R8zUKM; #PorterRanch; One-story home with fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 8; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 BC17 E107 E28 E287 E296 E8 RA70 RA828 T87 T96; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Update Behavioral Emergency; INC#1412; 02:33AM; WB 105 Fwy x W Imperial Hwy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Nci6x8; #Westchester; Thankfully, the patient has come down safely and is with LAWA PD. LAFD crews will pick up the air rescue cushions and clear the scene.; FS 95; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District outside city; BC4 E205 E237 E263 E264 E294 E295 E37 E43 E5 E51 E64 E67 E95 EM13 FR64 RA5 RA63 RA64 RA95 T37 T5 T63 T64 T94 T95; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Update Behavioral Emergency; INC#1412; 11:59PM; WB 105 Fwy x W Imperial Hwy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Nci6x8; #Westchester; Firefighters continue to be on standby with multiple air rescue cushions deployed below the 105 Freeway overpass, where an adult male has been perched above for hours. LAPD and CHP are on scene working to help this individual choose to come down in a safe manner. This incident continues to impact roadways in the area.; FS 95; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District outside city; BC4 E205 E237 E263 E264 E294 E295 E37 E43 E5 E51 E64 E67 E95 EM13 FR64 RA5 RA63 RA64 RA95 T37 T5 T63 T64 T94 T95; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Behavioral Emergency; INC#1412; 06:50PM; WB 105 Fwy x W Imperial Hwy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Nci6x8; #Westchester; LAFD is working closely with LAPD to help an agitated patient who is at risk of falling/jumping from the 105 Freeway East of Nash St. Motorists, please avoid the area. To assure patient and responder safety, several roadways in the vicinity will be closed. Traffic will be impacted for an unknown duration.; FS 95; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District outside city; BC4 E205 E295 E5 E51 E95 EM13 RA64 RA95 T5 T95; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0942; 01:59PM; 4719 S 8th Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RtUsP6; #HydePark; Thirty-two firefighters arrived to the two-story four-plex with heavy fire in one first floor unit. Crews quickly developed a hose line and entered the burning structure to extinguish the flames in 12 minutes (declared by radio at 1:59 PM). One patient with a minor medical complaint was evaluated on scene and released. No other injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E266 E294 E34 E66 E94 RA26 RA846 RA866 SQ21 T66 T94; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Update Technical Rescue; INC#0868; 02:10PM; 5420 W Sunset Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3t1NcAI; #EastHollywood; Firefighters set up a rope rescue system, suspended over the tip of the fire truck's aerial ladder, and rescued an injured worker (approximately 40-year-old male) from below grade. Paramedics secured the man to the rigid basket, and he was lifted to street level for ambulance transport with moderate injuries. Nothing further.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E82 RA27 RA82 T27 UR27; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0942; 01:47PM; 4719 S 8th Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RtUsP6; #HydePark; Two-story four-plex with fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E266 E294 E34 E66 E94 RA26 RA846 RA866 SQ21 T66 T94; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Technical Rescue; INC#0868; 01:05PM; 5420 W Sunset Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3t1NcAI; #EastHollywood; One worker was below grade level working, and fell approximately 6 feet. The worker is injured and unable to climb out of that location. Paramedics are with the worker now. LAFD Urban Search and Rescue (USAR) specialists are responding to perform a basket rescue using a rope system over the tip of the aerial ladder.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E82 RA82 T27 UR27; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0128; 03:33AM; 1000 W Sunset Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/4aeD60n; #Downtown; 56 Firefighters took just 37 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish fire within a vacant & boarded 7,400 square foot two-story office building, the site of a significant fire three days earlier. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 BC2 CM20 CM22 E11 E20 E203 E211 E220 E3 E4 EA1 EM1 RA20 RA3 RA803 SO1 SQ21 T11 T20 T3; CH9; 12, 13; Brian Humphrey
